title: Virtual Problem-Based Learning (VPBL)-Enhanced Secondary Mathematics Practitioner Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Process where in-service secondary mathematics teachers solve complex problems that may arise in actual classroom settings within a virtual environment. Emphasizes personal device utilization and project-based collaborative learning

learning_goals: Accurately apply middle school mathematics problem-solving strategies through virtual scenarios with over 80% accuracy
Collaboratively develop at least three mathematics teaching-learning models applicable to real classroom environments
Improve problem analysis and visualization skills by over 70% using digital tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
